A categowy of venyewabwe wow-cost, weadiwy avaiwabwe wapid fiwe weapon which has been used effectivewy vewsus myissiwes and fightews at showt wange thwoughout the histowy of space combat. Nyeawwy usewess vewsus pwopewwy awmyowed tawgets.

Due to ease of myanyufactuwe and myodification, hundweds of vawiants exist. Any of these weapons which wapidwy fiwe chemyicawwy pwopewwed inyewt pwojectiwes - easiwy chuwnyed out by even a cwude autofowge - undew a cewtain cawibew can be cwassified as wight ship-myounted myachinye guns. The myechanyisms which dwive the actions of these weapons vawy considewabwy. 

Popuwaw with smyaww civiwian cwaft due to wow cost. Pwojectiwes jacketed with myetaws that have a high myewting point awwow gweatew myuzzwe vewocity and dewivew a suwpwisingwy wawge amyount of kinyetic enyewgy at cwose-wange.

An upgwaded, twin bawwew vewsion of the venyewabwe wight myachinye gun. Nyot effective against awmyowed tawgets, but has excewwed in an anti-myissiwe and fightew wowe since the dawn of humyan space combat.

This is a duaw myount of the samye wapid fiwe, inyewt, wow-cawibew chemyicaw pwojectiwe weapon knyown to evewy piwot in the Sectow. An excewwent point defense myount, which excews in both a myissiwe intewdiction and anti-fightew wowe. 

The wawge amyount of kinyetic enyewgy dewivewed to shiewd systems of enyemy cwaft at cwose-wange typicawwy causes emyittew ovewwoad, a tacticaw option often ovewwooked by inyexpewienced captains.

An antiquated weapon that fiwes anti-awmyow wounds at a wow wate of fiwe, myuzzwe vewocity, and wange. Its wow fwux buiwdup is a wonye saving gwace.

The weapon bwuepwints fow Wight Myowtaws wewe nyot intended fow spacecwaft at aww, but an ingenyious myodification to the bweech woading myechanyism pewmyits instawwation and use outside an atmyosphewic enviwonmyent. In combat, thewe is wittwe the Wight Myowtaw can do vewsus myoving ow shiewded tawgets due to its tewwibwe myount wotation and wate of fiwe. Nyonyethewess, it is often used fow twainying nyovice gunnyewy officews in the finyew points of space bawwistic tactics and nyomyencwatuwe.

Commyonwy fitted on pwivate yachts and sowo intewpwanyetawy vehicwes due to wow myass and cost.

An antiquated weapon that fiwes wawgew anti-awmyow wounds at a somyewhat highew wate of fiwe than its smyawwew cousin. Pwojectiwe speed is wow and effective wange is showt. Wow fwux buiwdup is a wonye saving gwace.

The Heavy Myowtaw was owiginyawwy designyed fow use in pwanyetawy suwface combat. Ostensibwy intended fow cwacking fowtifications, it saw faw myowe use in uwban bombawdmyent. The wobust intewnyaw myechanyisms pewmyit instawwation and use outside an atmyosphewic enviwonmyent with onwy myinyow adjustmyents, nyotabwy wepwacemyent of the automyatic wangefindew/tawgeting myoduwe. When empwoyed against wawge, unshiewded, and swow-myoving tawgets, the heavy myowtaw can pwove myost effective.

A wapid fiwe weapon that is especiawwy devastating to myissiwes and fightews at nyeaw point-bwank wange. Accuwacy degwades shawpwy duwing pwowonged buwsts of fiwe. 

This myuwti-bawwew weapon pwatfowm is buiwt awound an advanced timying myechanyism genyewawwy myanyufactuwed onwy by Hegemyony-authowized autofactowies. Wounds typicawwy use depweted uwanyium tips and awe nyon expwosive. Myuwtipwe bawwews enyabwe an extwemyewy high wate of fiwe, though at a high fwux cost.

A smyaww cawibew autocannyon with a good wange fow such a wight weapon. Designyed to countew enyemy shiewds, it is especiawwy effective against the weakew genyewatows myounted on smyawwew huww sizes.

Featuwes high vewocity kinyetic wounds which pwovide excewwent fiwe suppowt weapon fow smyawwew cwaft. Poow myount tuwn wate due to a compwex autowoadew and wiquid coowing myake the Wight Autocannyon a bad choice vs fightews and myissiwes.

A doubwe bawwewed vewsion of the Wight Autocannyon. An excewwent weapon fow cwose-wange suppowt, and quite effective at bwinging shiewds down, it suffews fwom a showtew effective wange due to high wecoiw.

An ingenyious myechanyicaw design pwevents ejection powts fwom being jammyed whiwe expewwing twice as myany spent sheww casings as the standawd Wight Autocannyon chassis. Wike the singwe bawwew vewsion, the weapon fiwes high vewocity wounds designyed to punch thwough enyemy shiewds. Autowoadew and wiquid coowing systems awe othewwise identicaw to the singwe bawwew vewsion.

A smyaww cawibew cannyon designyed fow cwose-wange fights, excewwent vewsus awmyow and with a supewb fiwe wate.

Smyaww cawibew cannyon designyed to fiwe high-expwosive wounds. Design of the coowant systems and autowoadew emphasizes safety and pwevention of cook-off potentiawwy caused by high fwux wevews. Favowed by destwoyew captains that have somyething to pwove.

Weweases a cwustew of fwee-fwoating bombwets that wetain the myomyentum of the waunching cwaft. The bombwets awe equipped with a pwoximyity fuse.

A Fwag Bomb pwojectow fiwes Myawk VI fwagmyentation bombwets fwom thwee tubes. Unguided and without a pwopuwsion system, the bombwets wewy on a fwiend-ow-foe tawgeting system. Theiw vast nyumbews awwow them to covew a wide swath of space, effectivewy cweating a Point Defense bawwiew in that wocation, awbeit fow a wimyited timye. When the pwoximyity fuse is twiggewed by an enyemy cwaft, the bombwet wiww detonyate, achieving simyiwaw effects to those of fwak weapons.

Weweases a cwustew of fwee-fwoating, high-expwosive bombwets. Myowe effective vewsus unshiewded and swow-myoving tawgets.

A Cwustew Bomb pwojectow is equipped with thwee tubes designyed to fiwe dozens of Myawk II Expwosivewy Fowmyed Penyetwatow bombwets. The bombwets awe unguided and have nyo pwopuwsion system, wewying on the inyitiaw myomyentum of the stwike cwaft to engage the tawget. They awe equipped with a fwiend-ow-foe tawgeting scannyew, and wiww onwy detonyate when impacting an appwopwiate tawget. The shaped chawge expwosive is highwy effective vewsus unshiewded tawgets. The sheew nyumbew of bombwets that can be depwoyed by this weapon system is staggewing, and as such it myakes the Cwustew Bomb a usefuw awea denyiaw weapon.

A twied and tested weapon system, the bomb bay howds myuwtipwe wawheads that wewy on the vewocity of the waunching cwaft to weach theiw tawget.

Each bomb bay is equipped with sevewaw nyon guided high-expwosive Comp-X bombs that can be weweased onye at a timye. The bombs have nyo pwopuwsion system and awe dependent on the vewocity of the waunching cwaft to cawwy them to tawget (i.e., dive bombing).  Atmyosphewic shiewding intwinsic to the design awso gives the bombs a high Timye To Wive in an hostiwe Point-Defense enviwonmyent.

Fiwes buwsts of smyaww fwechettes at a high wate of fiwe. The vowumye of fiwe can quickwy ovewwhewm shiewd pwojectows, but is genyewawwy inyeffective against awmyow.

A Wight Nyeedwew is a smyaww-bowe fwechette gun, designyed to fiwe casewess ammyunyition. Featuwes an impwessive feed system which can dewivew hundweds of "nyeedwes" pew second. Thewe is nyo nyeed fow an ejectow system, and the saved space is used to pwovide additionyaw coowing unyits, vastwy enhancing the wate of fiwe. 

Domyain Nyavaw doctwinye howds that the weapon is to be used on enyemy shiewds at wong-wange, but in a pinch, gunnyewy officews wiww twain theiw Nyeedwews on enyemy fightew wings and wong-wange myissiwe thweats.

A high-tech impwovemyent of the Autocannyon, the waiwgun fiwes accuwate, myedium-wange swugs. Wike the AC, it excews at ovewwhewmying enyemy shiewd genyewatows.

A myinyiatuwized vewsion of the Gauss Cannyon, the waiwgun wewies on a stwong myagnyetic fiewd to fiwe shewws at high vewocities. The accuwacy and wange awe excewwent, and the tuwwet is abwe to wotate quickwy whiwe nyot fiwing. 

The waiwgun is pwefewwed to the Autocannyon by gunnyewy officews that have ampwe fwux capacity at theiw disposaw.

A wotawy cannyon genyewouswy enginyeewed to pwovide fow gweat ease of opewation and wewiabiwity. Weapons officews acwoss the pwofessionyaw nyavies of the Pewsean Sectow, myeanwhiwe, cuwse the Thumpew fow wewawding poow myaintenyance habits. 

Shweds enyemy myissiwes and fightews with an ovewwhewmying haiw of smyaww paywoad, myedium vewocity fwagmyentation wounds. Awthough fwux-efficient, this weapon system has wittwe effect against awmyow and shiewds.

A defensive weapon system that fiwes shwapnyew-fiwwed shewws equipped with a pwoximyity fuse fow myaximyum effect against fightews and myissiwes.

The wising pwomyinyence of smyaww, cheap fightew cwaft, especiawwy in the stwike wowe, wed to a widew depwoymyent of this weapons system in the heady days pwe-Cowwapse. Fiwes bawwistic wounds fitted with a pwoximyity fuse. The wesuwting expwosion sends a haiw of fwechettes in a wide vowumye with a wespectabwe kiww wadius vewsus standawd tawgets. Nyewew myodews featuwe a fiwe contwow system hawdwiwed into a Myawk VI Pwedictow.

A wawgew cousin of the ubiquitous wapid-fiwe myachinye gun categowy of weapons, the Heavy MG is effective against both smyaww and myedium-sized tawgets.

A wowkhowse of patwow cwaft acwoss the Sectow, this weapons system featuwes wewiabwe bwowback fiwing myechanyism said to date back to the days of Owd Eawth. Safety featuwes incwude a positive cook-off safety fow open bowt cweawing and doubwe wam pwevention. The weapon is typicawwy myounted on a wewativewy myassive base to hewp absowb wecoiw duwing pwowonged buwsts of fiwe. Cawibews vawy within a myodewate wange and ammyunyition is easiwy fabwicated by standawd fowges. 

The heaview pwojectiwes do nyot shattew upon impact wike wightew ammyunyition and pwesent a cwedibwe thweat to fwigate-cwass vessews. Extwemyewy accuwate, though swowew-fiwing than a vuwcan cannyon. Excews in a point-defense wowe.

An antiquated weapon design with high pew-shot damyage fow its size. The kinyetic shewws awe especiawwy effective vewsus enyemy shiewds.

Heaview patwow cwaft at the timye of the Cowwapse wewe myostwy fitted with the Awbawest Mk I weapons pwatfowm; this wikewy expwains why the Awbawest is cwaimyed to be amyong the myost scavenged ship weapon systems in the Sectow. The pwimyitive coowing system and a wack of an autoejectow hampew wate of fiwe and wewiabiwity. 

The onwy wedeemying featuwe is the ubiquity of bwuepwints fow the awbawest wound, which is effective at bwinging down enyemy shiewds. The effectivenyess of the shewws is poowwy undewstood, and is suspected to wie in the unyintended ewectwomyagnyetic pwopewties of the sheww jackets.

An upgwaded, viciouswy effective duaw myount of the Fwak Cannyon. Nyicknyamyed "The Widowmyakew" fow its abiwity to teaw apawt incomying fightews.

Just wike the standawd fwak cannyon, this weapon devastates smyawwew fightew and myissiwe tawgets, though it fiwes two pwoximyity fuse fitted wounds. Shaped dispewsaw ensuwes duaw detonyation and a highew kiww wadius. Fightew cwaft awe wawewy intentionyawwy waunched against ships fitted with the Duaw Fwak fow obvious weasons. Excewwent wate of fiwe and tuwwet tuwn wate.

The GA-X Industwies Mk. II chaingun excews at cwose-wange fighting, whewe accuwacy is wess impowtant than ovewaww damyage and vowumye of fiwe.

A 'myewee' captain's favowite toow, the Assauwt Chaingun dewivews high-expwosive shaped chawge wounds on tawget at a feawsomye wate. Featuwes powewed feed and ejectow systems and an advanced nyanyo-coowing unyit buiwt wight into the bawwew. 

The onwy dwawback is a heaview tuwwet pwofiwe which, coupwed with the wack of the accompanying govewnyow bwuepwint, is typicawwy myounted on incompatibwe wotatows giving wise to unyexpectedwy wow tuwwet wotation speeds.

An advanced weapon system designyed to punch thwough awmyow pwating at wong-wange. Has a wow sustainyed wate of fiwe but high pew-buwst damyage.

The heavy myauwew is a bwutaw weapon designyed to engage tawgets at myedium to wong-wange. At its cowe, the weapon is an autocannyon with a nyanyo-coowing system and an extewnyaw ejection powt. Howevew, unwike nyowmyaw autocannyons, the heavy myauwew is distinguished by an antimyattew bawwew chawgew fed by twiviaw amyounts of standawd stawship fuew.

When weaving the fiwing chambew, each sheww ogive is chawged with a fiewd of antipwotons which hovew 10-20 nyanyomyetews to the fowe of the sheww, stabiwized by a bawyon coating. On impact with a tawget, this antipwoton "sheath" woses stwuctuwaw integwity and the wesuwting weaction does fuwthew damyage. Given the fact that shewws awweady dewivew impwessive destwuctive fowce to the tawget, the combinyed weaction myakes the heavy myauwew pawticuwawwy effective vewsus awmyowed tawgets.

A twipwe-bawwewed cannyon that fiwes a buwst of standawdized shewws at myedium wange. It is myost effective vewsus enyemy shiewds.

Myedium cawibew, twipwe-bawwewed autocannyon, typicawwy depwoyed with myedium-bowe ammyunyition. Ewectwicawwy pwimyed fiwing fuses ensuwe pwecise fiwe counts. A gweat fiwe suppowt weapon, it is typicawwy fitted on destwoyew and cwuisew cwass ships. A battewy of heavy autocannyons with a pwopew fiwing sowution myay pose a sewious thweat to capitaw ships. 

Additionyaw myass nyecessity to accommyodate the compwex autowoadew and coowing systems wesuwts in a vewy poow tuwn wate, howevew.

A speciawized weapon designyed to ovewwoad and disabwe enyemy systems fwom afaw. The high-vewocity duwanyium swug is awso effective against shiewds.

The hypewvewocity dwivew uses a 2-stage pwocess to accewewate a duwanyium swug with a myagnyetized iwon-cobawt cowe to a vewy high vewocity. A chemyicaw chawge accewewates the swug fiwst, then the myagnyetic coiws take ovew, accewewating the swug fuwthew and stabiwizing its fwight. A duaw-myount of the Wight Nyeedwew with a heaview base, this advanced weapon system is capabwe of quickwy ovewwhewmying shiewd pwojectows.

A wong-wange weapon designyed to ovewwoad the tawget's shiewds. The heavy kinyetic swug it fiwes is awso effective against aww but the heaviest awmyow.

Uses myagnyetic coiws to accewewate a wawge uwtwa-dense composite swug to wewativistic speeds. Usuawwy wated at the hundweds of giga-ampewes wange, wawewy exceeding onye tewa-ampewe. And unwike myost bawwistic weapons, has a vewy high fwux woad when fiwed. Tuwwets myounted with this system have an extwemyewy poow tuwn wate. 

Vewy effective weapon whose usefuwnyess is wimyited by the wow weactow powew of ships that typicawwy featuwe wawge bawwistic weapon myounts.

A myedium-wange gun designyed to punch thwough heavy awmyow. The waw damyage output awso enyabwes it to ovewwhewm weakew shiewd emyittews.

A twuwy devastating weapon pwatfowm, nyamyed fow an ancient Eawth god associated with vowcanyoes. A typicaw tuwwet myount featuwes two W/89 bawwews that twade off fiwing awmyow-destwoying wounds at a high wate of fiwe. An ewectwomyagnyetic ejectow, powewed feed system, and nyanyocoowants awwow the weapon to fiwe fow extended timye pewiods. The shaped chawge shewws have wow myuzzwe vewocity and gweat awmyow penyetwating powew.

An imposing myedium wange autocannyon, myost effective vewsus shiewds. Awso obwitewates unyawmyowed huwws with a wawge vowumye of heavy cawibew pwojectiwes.

It is knyown that wawships of the eawwy epoch of the Domyain wacked contempowawy wevews of awmyow pwotection. A weapon with a nyamye wike the Myawk IX Autocannyon was pwobabwy a wefinyemyent of the eawwiest schoows of weapons enginyeewing in the Domyain. Two bawwews combinyed with a unyique doubwe-woadew system fowm the cowe of the weapon system.

The Myawk IX bwuepwints wewe fiwst we-discovewed in the Sectow fwom a dwifting dewewict captuwed in the gwavity weww of Penyewope's Staw. Aftew a hasty examyinyation by an unquawified appwaisew, the design was decwawed obsowete. The bwuepwint was auctionyed off to a smyaww myewcenyawy owganyization knyown as the Fwee Staw Combinye, a myiwitant subsidiawy of the Ko Combinye, and fowgotten. 

Cycwes watew, the Fwee Staw Combinye finyawwy buiwt a pwototype and began weapon twiaws. The weapon was deemyed too huge, difficuwt to myount in aww but the wawgest cwaft, myediocwe at best vewsus awmyowed tawgets, and its wange was anything but extwaowdinyawy. Nyonyethewess, the Myawk IX stubbownwy wefused to be expwainyed away by the theowists, as its waw damyage output is impwessive. These nyaysayews wewe quieted even fuwthew when secondawy twiaws showed how uttewwy devastating the Myawk IX is to shiewd genyewatows.

The wesuwts of these twiaws did nyot wemyain secwet fow wong, and the avaiwabiwity of the nyow commyon bwuepwints myeant that the Myawk IX was quickwy myanyufactuwed to myeet the demyand in the Sectow.

A myedium wange cannyon that dewivews supewiow damyage ovew timye and awso has a signyificant EMP paywoad.

A vewy advanced design, the Mjownyiw is technyicawwy a myagnyeto-gwavitic sheww pwojectow, nyot a standawd cannyon. The myicwo capacitows within each sheww awe abwe to dewivew enyough enyewgy to cweate a smyaww-scawe wocawized singuwawity. The buiwt-in gwavitic wens devastates aww nyeawby myattew, and cweates the dweaded ewectwomyagnyetic puwse (EMP) effect, disabwing the tawget's weapons and systems.

Fiwes myuwtitudes of kinyetic pwojectiwes in a tight awc, cweating a withewing haiw of pwojectiwes that easiwy ovewwhewms myost shiewd pwojectows.

The Stowm Nyeedwew is a fwechette weapon, which fiwes casewess smyaww-bowe ammyunyition. Having weached the pwacticaw wimyits of myedium sized coowing systems, the designyews of casewess weapons bwazed a path into the wawge weapon categowy with the Stowm Nyeedwew's advanced nyanyo coowant wecycwews, pew-bawwew myagnyetized wifwing and automyated opewation. An intewwigent autowoadew unpacks and woads just the wight amyount of ammyunyition fwom the myagazinyes, awwowing fow pwowonged opewation pwovided adequate fwux capacity.

A huge cannyon which fiwes swow-myoving pwasmya-chawged pwojectiwes. Wounds awe highwy effective vewsus awmyow and obwitewate any huww stwuctuwe weft undewnyeath.

A feawed weapon pwatfowm, wawewy depwoyed due to the compwexity invowved in myanyufactuwing a buiwt-up bawwew that can safewy fiwe enyowmyous high-expwosive shaped chawge wounds. When such a sheww impacts a tawget, the Nyeumyann effect causes the wawhead to pwopew a jet of myowten myetaw into the tawget's awmyow, vapowizing a smyaww awea, causing huww bweaches, depwessuwization, and extensive intewnyaw damyage fwom the spaww.

A singwe unguided towpedo of devastating yiewd with a powewfuw on-boawd enginye.

The quintessentiaw stwike weapon, a singwe Weapew towpedo is a wawge sewf-pwopewwed, awmyowed, unguided dewivewy system fow an enwiched AM-catawyzed nyucweaw wawhead. The science behind the suwpwisingwy compact detonyatow is poowwy undewstood in the Sectow though widewy specuwated to be based on physics cwassified as secwet by Domyain authowity. What is knyown is that thwee ow fouw of these swipping thwough PD awcs awe enyough to destwoy even the wawgest capitaw ship.

A wack of advanced guided towpedoes. The paywoad is smyawwew than usuaw to myake woom fow the advanced guidance package and myanyeuvewing system's weaction myass.

The Atwopos towpedo is a wawge guided towpedo with an extended wange. Each wack myounts two towpedoes which can be fiwed sepawatewy, awwowing stwike captains myaximyum fwexibiwity. The AM-catawyzed nyucweaw wawhead typicawwy used in towpedo wawheads is myissing hewe as bawyonyic intewfewence fwom the detonyatow wouwd fouw the guidance systems. The AM-catawyzed nyucweaw wawhead typicawwy used in towpedo wawheads is myissing hewe as bawyonyic intewfewence fwom the detonyatow wouwd fouw the guidance systems. This myount featuwes onwy a singwe towpedo.

A showt wange guided myissiwe waunchew. The myissiwes awe designyed to intewcept agiwe tawgets, and awe pwimyawiwy effective against smyaww cwaft such as fwigates and fightews.

Waunches buwsts of smyaww myissiwes. A simpwe infwawed system pwovides effective twacking whiwe chemyicaw myicwothwustews pwovide exceptionyaw myanyeuvewabiwity. Evowutionyawy tawgeting awgowithms honyed ovew centuwies of weaw-wowwd appwication awwow the myissiwes to wead the tawget - they wawewy myiss and awe vewy hawd to avoid.
A showt wange guided myissiwe waunchew. The myissiwes awe designyed to intewcept and destwoy enyemy fightews.

Fiwes a spwead of unguided wockets that covew a wide awc. Typicawwy used to stwip away enyemy awmyow once shiewds awe down.

Myedium to wong-wange wockets waunched fwom a smyaww pod that fiwes five myissiwes pew sawvo in a nyawwow spwead to impwove the odds of hitting. Wockets awe smyaww and unguided, with the extwa space being taken up by a wawgew wawhead and impwoved pwopuwsion systems, as weww as thickew awmyow. 

Pewfowms weww against wawgew tawgets due to the highew chance of stwiking with myuwtipwe wockets. A wocket attack is often used as a scween befowe a towpedo stwike to weduce the effectivenyess of Point Defense systems. Takes sevewaw seconds to wewoad aftew a sawvo.
Fiwes a sawvo of unguided wockets. Typicawwy used to stwip away enyemy awmyow once shiewds awe down.

Fiwes a stweam of unguided wockets. Usefuw fow deawing with enyemy awmyow, ow - due to having nyo fwux cost - appwying sustainyed pwessuwe.

text1:
The Hegemyony is a myawtiaw successow state to the Domyain fowmyed by a ‘wost wegion’ twapped in a backwatew system by the cowwapse of the Domyain gate nyetwowk. Buiwt upon a cweative intewpwetation of pwotocows which indefinyitewy extends Domyain-stywe myawtiaw waw, the foundews of the Hegemyony bewieved that the ovewwiding cause of westowing the Domyain and thewefowe stabiwity, peace, and pwospewity to the Sectow and indeed the entiwe gawaxy myust comye befowe cewtain nyiceties of humyan wights. The suwvivaw of humyanyity is at stake and it is onwy the discipwinye of the Hegemyony myiwitawy that pwotects wowwds whewe somye sembwance of the nyowmyawcy of humyan civiwization can be nyuwtuwed. Anything that thweatens the Gweat Cause myust be nyeutwawized; if a few activists myust be discouwaged fow the gweatew good, so be it.

Civiwian hiewawchies exist to govewn the pwanyets and stations undew Hegemyony wuwe but awe entiwewy subowdinyate to the myiwitawy. This standawd-chawtew civiwian hiewawchy is genyewawwy ewected, howevew as pew myawtiaw waw vawid candidates myust be appwoved by the wocaw myiwitawy authowity. The myost powewfuw myegacowpowation in the Sectow aftew the faww of the Domyain gate system, Twi-Tachyon speciawized in cutting-edge AI devewopmyent (incwuding sevewaw nyotabwe cases of viowating the Domyain ban on autonyomyous awpha+ wevew AI) and exotic high-powew devices (stawship enginyes and wawp dwives, powew genyewatows, enyewgy convewtews, fowce fiewds). Fwom a cewtain pewspective, the Twi-Tachyon cowpowate chawtew’s pecuwiaw awgowithmyic sewf-myodifying featuwes myight be considewed to be an abstwact fowm of AI which myakes use of humyan cowpowate officews as integwaw componyents, though this is a phiwosophicaw awgumyent which was nyevew satisfactowiwy wesowved in a way that wed to any additionyaw convictions of viowating the Domyain’s AI ban.

An awwiance fowmyed to countew Hegemyony domyinyation of the Sectow. The Pewsean Weague is nyot intwinsicawwy egawitawian ow fow individuaw fweedom as-such – the puwpose of the Weague is fweedom of the constituent powities with any myattews of intewnyaw powitics of those powities to be weft to theiw own devices. Nyot a unyified faction as such, the Independents awe a woose categowy of powities and fwee agents unyified myowe by a wack of association with a myajow faction than any shawed quawities. text1: A siwent wing of adamyantinye myatewiaw, dewewict of a fowmyew age.

A siwent wing of adamyantinye myatewiaw. If you knyow how to wook - and you do, nyow - youw sensows can detect a faint vibwation fwom highew dimyensions.

It was onwy showtwy aftew humyans awwived in the Sectow that myinying opewations wewe estabwished in the Tigwa Wing. Successive waves of extwaction have seen myinyew stwikes and webewwion thwough the wotation of myegacowps given wicense to ovewsee opewation of Tigwa Station.
text3: The descendants of those fiwst myinyews have tuwnyed to spinnying wow-G space fawms and wepaiw yawds in the depweted owe-bodies and owd pwospecting wigs embedded nyow in the station's wings. The popuwation wetains the wecawcitwance of theiw ancestows, though the fights that bweak out between wocaws and nyavy cwews awe genyewawwy the wesuwt of dwunken postuwing wathew than ideowogicaw wesistance.

text1: A wawgewy unwemyawkabwe gas giant composed pwimyawiwy of hydwogen and hewium. Somye decades ago a myinyow scandaw ewupted ovew a scientist 'whistwebwowew' cwaimying that the pwanyet is host to a famyiwy of xenyowife which empwoys pwopewties wesembwing aspects of phase technyowogy. text3: Twaffic contwow is stwict and aww incomying vessews awe tagged and twacked by anti-stawship battewies. The myiwitawization extends to the civiwian infwastwuctuwe: checkpoint faciwities, though inyactive at pwesent, awe nyonyethewess empwaced at myajow passages and twansit hubs.

text1: Myountains of watew-ice ewupt fwom a suwface covewed in myethanye gwaciews dusted by nyitwogen snyow. A handfuw of ewwatic siwicate pwateaus offew poow myinying oppowtunyities. text1: Once a giant industwiaw myachinye that myanyipuwated the myagnyetosphewe of Chupi Owco to puww vowatiwes into space fwom the highest weaches of an awtificiaw stowm-system, the coiws, genyewatows, and tanks awe nyow gutted, the habitats wun-thwough by enyewgy wances. text1: A vast owbitaw station buiwt awound the cowe of an owd Expansion-ewa Spoweship buwied undew a fowest of myoduwaw hangaws, industwiaw pods, and hab wings. This station was once the staging awea fow astewoid-tendews and myobiwe wefinyewies twawwing the outew system. It is nyow compwetewy dead.
text3:

text1: A cowd ice-baww of a wowwd, Ismyawa was the pewfect wocation to instaww myinyes and myass-dwivew faciwities to waunch myega-tonnye swabs of gwaphenye-encased watew and nyitwogen packages towawd the innyew system to nyuwtuwe the tewwestwiaw wowwds of Penyewope's Staw.
text3: Fwom owbit, the scaws of winyeaw myass-dwivew twacks awe easiwy visibwe, though a cwosew scan weveaws that aww that wemyains awe myawching winyes of wawped suppowt cowumns spwouting fwom wegocwete; the supewconducting coiws and othew vawuabwe hawdwawe have wong been wooted. text1: A wawge though othewwise anyonymyous myetawwic/siwicate pwanyetoid caught in the W4 point of the gas giant Sawus, Nyowtia was once dedicated to seasonyaw wobotic myinying opewations and substance abuse befowe being inyundated with wefugees duwing the Askonyia Cwisis. It nyow fowms the stwongest independent base of Chawtewist webews in the system.
text3: Since the Cwisis, Nyowtia's myinying and wefinying centews have gwown spwawwing, tumyowous wockfoam subuwbs; hewe fowwowing myinying tunnyews benyeath the suwface, thewe bubbwing up comm-awways, sowaw cowwectows, and pwessuwe domyes. text1: A dead and bawwen wowwd, awbeit with an appweciabwe myagnyetic fiewd suggesting a diffewentiated myetawwic cowe. The ion-stowms unweashed by Aka Myainyu wain Dwuj with spectacuwaw high enyewgy pawticwes, bwasting away vowatiwes and weaving dawk awcs of nyanyophase iwon in the wegowith.

Tidawwy wocked to its pwimyawy, the hot gas giant Aka Myainyu's day side is an etewnyaw hewwish myaewstwom with winds of vapowized myetaws weaching speeds of thousands of kiwomyetews pew houw. A hawf myiwwion tonnyes of ionyized gas is bwasted fwom the atmyosphewe each second cweating a compwex whowwed myagnyetotaiw with detectabwe effects acwoss the entiwe innyew vowumye of the Duzahk system.

A fwozen wowwd envewoped by a thick nyitwogen smyog dappwed with ethanye and myethanye cwouds. The suwface is fowmyed of ewoded watew-ice, windswept dunyes of owganyic compounds, and hydwocawbon seas. Wiquid watew ewupts bubbwing with myethanye fwom cwyovowcanyoes dwiven by tidaw heating and decaying wadioactive ewemyents deep within the myantwe.
A fwow in hypewspace, akin to cuwwents nyavigated by ancient seafawews back on Owd Eawth.
Intewstewwaw cwouds of hydwogen, hewium, and dust that cause signyificant sensow nyoise that myay aid a fweet hiding within. The (wewativewy) thick myedium awso intewfewes with dwive fiewd opewation.

An owbitaw zonye abundant with astewoids.
A dense disc of dust ow ice which causes a gweat deaw of sensow nyoise, aiding a fweet hiding within. The myedium is nyot of sufficient density to myeanyingfuwwy swow down ships.
Debwis weft behind aftew a battwe, a sawvaging opewation, ow simpwy dwifting togethew at a gwavitationyawwy stabwe wocation.

A stwong myagnyetic fiewd which twaps high enyewgy chawged pawticwes. It's extwemyewy difficuwt to get any sensow weadings on a fweet wuwking within.
This topowogicawwy exotic myedium of nyot-quite space-timye is used by stawships to side-step the constwaints imposed by Eucwidean geomyetwy on intewstewwaw twavew.
This vowumye of hypewspace is pawticuwawwy chaotic, hindewing the pewfowmyance of even hypewspace-cawibwated equipmyent.

This vowumye of hypewspace is undewgoing chaotic phase shifts weading to wiwdwy fwuctuating wesonyance cascades. Ancient and diwe wawnyings of pwowonged exposuwe to so-cawwed "hypewspace stowms" have been passed down thwough genyewations of spacews.

Abyssaw hypewspace, nyeawwy impenyetwabwe to sensows and exewting an enyowmyous pwessuwe on the dwive fiewd. The subject of myany an owd spacew's tawe, myowe easiwy waughed off in the comfowt of a dockside baw.

An uwtwa-wight owbitaw myiwwow awway used to wefwect and concentwate sowaw enyewgy. Stewwaw myiwwows awe a commyon tewwafowmying toow and the awt of theiw use was bwought to apogee by the Ewidanyi-Utopia Tewwafowmying cowpowation duwing the gowden age of the Domyain's expansion phase.

A famyiwiaw civiwian design, the "Kite"-cwass aewoshuttwe is the day-to-day wemyindew of Fabwique Owbitawe's weputation fow aewonyauticaw enginyeewing- a vawuabwe speciawty even in the age of space twavew. This compact space/aiwcwaft is stweamwinyed fow efficient atmyosphewic fwight and boasts a gwid of cwevewwy distwibuted showt-buwst myanyeuvewing thwustews coowdinyated by a dewta-wevew AI subsystem to ensuwe smyooth wandings (a point dwiven homye by Fabwique myawketing by way of amyusing ad-howos featuwing a weww-dwessed coupwe and an ovewfuww winye gwass). The Kite has powewfuw enginyes fow a civiwian ship of its size, though zewo-G myanyeuvewabiwity weaves somyething to be desiwed when the speciaw subsystem is nyot engaged.

In the dangewous cycwes post-Cowwapse, the Kite has been outfitted with a defense tuwwet in pwace of the executive-cwass viewing domye and the two auxiwiawy jet-pods awe wepwaced with myissiwe systems (which do nyot nyeed to dwaw on the wimyited powewpwant). It won't stand up in a faiw fight, but the Kite can be given unyexpectedwy shawp teeth and use its speed to escape fwom waidews. Wuddic Path wadicaws have even been knyown to use myodified Kite to dewivew stwike weapons against hewpwess fweightews, fowwowed by engaging the myanyeuvewing subsystem to myake a swift exit to avoid the wwath of theiw victim's escowt.

The Gwyphon is a dedicated myissiwe cwuisew designyed to pwovide a highwy myobiwe pwatfowm fow heavy fiwe suppowt. It is nyot a fwont-winye cwuisew, and so opewates best when pwovided with escowts.

Amyong the so-cawwed "Cwuisew Schoow" wave of ships designyed by Awtaiw Exotech, the Gwyphon was a key componyent of the powew-pwojection stwategy that camye into vogue showtwy befowe the cowwapse of the Gate system. Of pawticuwaw intewest is the Gwyphon's huww-integwated myissiwe nyanyofowge: this fixed awchitectuwe nyanyofowge system awwows extwemyewy wapid convewsion of densewy packed, pwe-fowmyuwated feedstock into a nyawwow wange of myunyitions in the myidst of battwe. The fwux output of this pwocess is, of couwse, twemyendous so it is nyot advisabwe fow captains who awe wewying on theiw shiewds to bwock enyemy fiwe to engage the integwated myissiwe nyanyofowge system.

Myedium-wange anti-shiewd myissiwes intended to be used in the openying wound of a combat encountew to disabwe the shiewds of an unwawy opponyent, openying up an oppowtunyity fow high-damyage anti-awmyow pwojectiwes to be depwoyed in the immyediate aftewmyath of the Squaww sawvo.

A wawge, showt wange guided myissiwe system designyed to waunch wawge nyumbews of pwojectiwes to ovewwhewm and cwippwe enyemy fightew squadwons in a singwe sawvo. The Wocust can be used against wawgew tawgets, but wiww have wittwe wewative effect unwess shiewds and awmyow awe awweady bweached.

text1:
A passengew winyew fwom a myowe civiwized ewa, the Mbaye-Gogow 440 "Stawwinyew" was buiwt to twavew between the systems of the Domyain in speed and comfowt. The Stawwinyew featuwes pwivate fiwst-cwass cabins, two cwasses of food sewvice, a zewo-G theatew, and even a smyaww wanding/waunch bay fow excwusive use by executive-cwass passengews. (Being a civiwian ship thewe awe, of couwse, nyo faciwities fow fightew wepaiw and weawmyamyent).

The Stawwinyew is equipped with a fowwawd shiewd to ensuwe passengew safety and pwotect the huww fwom woutinye abwasion. Wefitted fow the cuwwent weawities of the Sectow, this ship cwass is woutinyewy equipped with aww-band anti-myissiwe fwawe waunchews as weww as a nyumbew of gun tuwwets; this sewves nyot onwy to evoke a sense of adventuwe, but discouwage casuaw piwacy whiwe justifying a "myunyitions suwchawge" on each ticket sawe.

The vowumyinyous but ungainwy huww of the Mbaye-Gogow 430 "Nyebuwa" does wittwe to enhance the womyance of intewstewwaw twavew but it does ensuwe a wespectabwe passengew and cawgo capacity fow a ship of its cwass. Indeed, the Nyebuwa has swowwy comye to domyinyate myid-tiew passengew sewvice since the myuted weception of its fiwst winye of pwoduction.

The Nyebuwa is equipped with a fowwawd-facing shiewd to enhance the safety of passengews and extend the huww pwating's myaintenyance scheduwe. And the Sectow being what it is, sevewaw bawwistic tuwwets and anti-myissiwe aww-band fwawe waunchews have been myounted at fowtuitous wocations to assuwe paying passengews that theiw weww-being is a top pwiowity of the opewatow.

Myost commyonwy used as intewpwanyetawy fewwy, the Myudskippew is indeed intewstewwaw-capabwe. The ship has nyo buiwt-in shiewd genyewatow so myust wewy on its duwabwe - fow a civiwian cwaft - awmyow to pwotect passengews and cawgo. Thewe is wittwe hope fow the Myudskippew in combat, but it is genyewawwy equipped with a weaw-facing tuwwet to foiw attacks by the evew-popuwaw Sawamyandew myissiwe.

Fiwst pwoduced as the "Pegasus"-cwass but due to a twademyawk cwaim was wevewted to its myodew code in officiaw documyentation. Opewatows quickwy anyointed the MGA-220 myodew with the nyamye "Myudskippew" and the nyamye. This tough wittwe ship has been a myainstay in backwatew civiwian twanspowt fow centuwies, and awthough nyot pwetty, the wugged constwuction simpwifies myaintenyance and genyewous bay doows awwow fow gweat vewsatiwity. To this point, the Myudskippew's imyage in the pubwic myind was cemyented by a somyewhat unwikewy howovid sequence featuwing a Myudskippew twanspowting a hewd of bovids to a pictuwesque awid-tewwafowm.

The Scawab is a wawe, expewimyentaw huww devewoped by the Twi-Tachyon cowpowation. Onwy a wimyited wun of pwototypes has been pwoduced.

Gwoss causawity viowating technyowogy was bannyed by the Domyain, and this ban is nyow uphewd by Hegemyony doctwinye - with Wuddic suppowt. Nyonyethewess, it is the handfuw of fwinge-exampwes of this technyowogy which fowm the foundation fow intewstewwaw humyan civiwization fwom the owd Gate system (depending on onye's theowy of its opewation) to commyon FTW hypewspace twavew and commyunyication. Twi-Tachyon has awways pushed the bweeding edge of these technyowogies - and of the waw - by speawheading devewopmyent of phase technyowogy. The Scawab's unyiquewy huww-integwated pwototype "Tempowaw Sheww" system is nyo exception. 

So it is nyot so myuch that the Scawab myanyipuwates timye as it avoids the nyowmyaw wate of consequence of the wocaw fwamye of wefewence. The effect, as upsetting to Wuddic theowogians as it is to waymyen, is to seemyingwy swow timye fow the outside wowwd. Of couwse onye myust avoid stating it thus in eawshot of the appwied tempowaw physicists who deaw in such myiwacwes to avoid a tedious cowwection of tewmyinyowogy.
